Summary: 8 or 9 grouped lights traveling north to south.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Florissant
There were no other sightings in Florissant on or around May 9th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi witnessed a group of bright pin point lights approximately 7,000 ft.- 10,000 ft. moving from north to south in sky. they appeared to be disk in shape and moved in an unorganized formation. i photographed the objects on my rear apartment balcony until they passed. i then ran through my apartment to my front door and continued to photograph them from my front balcony. the objects stopped suddenly and floated in the sky. then they went separately in various directions. one or two went straight up till out of sight. one went south west, two went east a couple others kinda went into the clouds. i called another person and they saw two lights in the sky also. the light were so very bright that i feel they burned into my eyes. it was a bright and blue sky with small puffy\fluffy clouds. strange movement for balloons. 1. i was on my computer reading email and looking at youtube videos. 2. not sure why i got up from the computer and looked out on my balcony. at first glance, i looked right at them above the trees, as if i knew they would be there. 3. i kinda thought they were helicopters but i was perplexed at the formation and the faintness of glow. 4. the objects floated and stopped and moved freely in various directions. the objects seemed to vibrate. 5. i felt unusually nervous taking the pictures. i am a digital photographer. 6. the objects dispersed into different directions and faded out of sight.
